definition: to break/to sever/to turn off (electric switch)
to break/to snap/to cut off/to give up or abstain from sth/to judge/(usu. used in the negative) absolutely/definitely/decidedly

to open/to start/to turn on/to boil/to write out (a prescription, check, invoice etc)/to operate (a vehicle)/carat (gold)/abbr. for Kelvin, 開爾文|开尔文[Kai1 er3 wen2]/abbr. for 開本|开本[kai1 ben3], book format

sentences.english: The connection could not be disconnected because it was created by the multi-protocol router.
sentences.chinese: 通讯不能被断开，因为该通讯被多协议路由器完成。

sentences.english: “Well, what is disconnection?” Roberts said again.
sentences.chinese: “好吧，‘断开’到底是什么？”罗伯茨再次追问。

sentences.english: You can force some or all connections off from a database.
sentences.chinese: 可以迫使某些或所有应用程序断开与数据库的连接。

sentences.english: Disconnect the Internet and power off your cell phone if you have to.
sentences.chinese: 如果必要的话断开你的网络并关闭手机。

sentences.english: This includes planned disconnection as well as abrupt disconnection from the local network.
sentences.chinese: 包括计划好的断开以及本地网络的突发断开。

sentences.english: This includes planned disconnection as well as abrupt disconnection from the local network.
sentences.chinese: 包括计划好的断开以及本地网络的突发断开。

sentences.english: Cracks in material were simulated through breaking beam elements.
sentences.chinese: 材料内部裂纹通过断开梁单元来模拟。

sentences.english: Whether NetworkManager should be connected and disconnected on sleep.
sentences.chinese: 睡眠时网络管理器是否应当连接或断开连接。

sentences.english: Usually, the graph contains several Data Objects in a hierarchical tree structure. The client works with the graph using a disconnected programming model.
sentences.chinese: 此客户机使用断开连接的编程模型来处理数据图。

sentences.english: Finally, the strokes, which left by erasing grid-line, are reconstructed.
sentences.chinese: 最后再对因格线删除而断开的笔画进行重构。

sentences.english: Right-click to open and close the circuit.
Each surge at power-on contributed to small changes that eventually caused the fuse to open.
sentences.chinese: 上电的每个浪涌贡献了小改变，最终导致保险丝断开。

sentences.english: Right-click to open or close on rising temperature.
sentences.chinese: 温度升高时，右击断开或接通电路。

definition: to link/to join/to attach/connection/a link (on web page)
to cut short/to break off/to discontinue/to interrupt
to connect (a cable etc)/to hook up (a device)/to resume (a conversation)/to set (a bone)
to close by coming together (like the lips of a wound, the doors of an elevator, the walls of a channel)/to close by connecting in a loop (like a circuit)/closed-loop
to break or cut in two/to sever/to cut off/(fig.) to cut off (a conversation, a flow etc)/to interrupt/(math.) to truncate
power switch/gas valve/to open the city (or frontier) gate/to open and close/to switch on and off
(of a guitar, kite etc) to have a string break/(of a tradition etc) to be discontinued/(telephone or Internet connection) disconnected/cut off
